body:
Configuration file

Please press the configure button (red in figure) to upload a JSon file if you want to specify the programs to run .

A common configure file should follow the format in the figure below,

among which keys of name, category, checked, runCmd, time(estimated time to finish running the specified program) must be set. After that please press the save button to load the configuration automatically

Customize running programs

To customize the running programs please specified (only) the argument values in the command line dialog.

Please notice that the path to run the program is not required to be specified in the command line.

To find information for options available for this program please press the button next to the reset button. It will expand a doc dialog.

After that press the save button before running. However this will not change the default settings the next time it starts
